item.title: Findings 3
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Modeling Census Tract Level Evictions: Visualization of socio-demographic variables and eviction rates in Richmond 2013-2018 In the visualization below, we visualized an eviction indicator for census tracts in the city of Richmond. Embedded Shiny Apps In the visualization below, we visualized eviction filings between Jan-May 2020. This temporal maps give us an idea about how eviction filing changed due the COVID pandemic.
